alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 15 at 10:51AM CDT until May 15 at 11:15AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN LAWRENCE...EASTERN JASPER AND SOUTHERN DADE COUNTIES... At 1051 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Everton to 8 miles northeast of Sarcoxie to near Carthage, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Carthage... Carterville... Duquesne... Greenfield... Sarcoxie... Duenweg... Lockwood... Miller... Alba... Everton... Carytown... Fidelity... Stotts City... Avilla... La Russell... Brooklyn Heights... Reeds... South Greenfield... Atlas... Red Oak... This includes the following highways... Interstate 44 between mile markers 11 and 38. Interstate 49 between mile markers 36 and 53. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
